description:
Do You Want BUILD A WEBSITE EASILY? LEARN The NEW HTML5 Codes?
Become A TOP WEBMASTER?!
JOIN THIS COURSE AND MAKE YOUR PROFESSIONAL WEBSITE FROM SCRATCH!

You don't need any experience to take this course. However, if you have some knowledge of HTML codes, now we introducing you to the new tags HTML5.

Throughout the course, we'll be building a handful of simple websites step-by-step in HTML5, personal or professional, and be transformed from a total beginner to a advance webmaster: I think you'll be excited to learn!

This course, "Learn HTML5 from Scratch in less 3 hours - Flash Course" on HTML5 training, allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college. The course includes basic introductory lessons to HTML5 codes. You will become familiar with the editor Brackets, web page customization, Adding pages to your site, insert Audio and Video Input, Geolocation, WebStorage, Drag&Drop, Canvas, creating your dynamic website!

"The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace."

ARE YOU READY TO LEARN THE LAST HTLM LANGUAGE? AND BUILD A PROFESSIONAL WEBSITE NOW!!

The course package:
  • 13 video tutorials (about 2.30 hours total)
  • 3 Levels: Basic, Advanced and Expert
  • Videos available, 24 hours on 24
  • Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
  • Build a Professional Website!
The course outline:
  • What Is HTML/HTML5?
  • History and HTML5 vs Flash
  • Brackets Editor HTML
  • HTML5 Input
  • HTML5 Form
  • Audio Files
  • Video Files
  • Drag & Drop
  • WebStorage
  • Geolocation
  • Canvas
Learning Objective:
  • Learn how to use the New HTML 5 Commands from Scratch !
  • Use HTML5 Codes for Your Website!
  • Basics and Advance commands!
  • By the end of the course you have Learn the Professional Codes of Web Programming through practical exercises!
  • Build Your Dynamic Websites with Live Interactions!
title: The True HTML 5 from Beginners!
